forum.content:
Hello new friends, let me introduce myself for you guys.

178/68

Working at Singapore company.

No Sat,Sun and public holiday for break, only 4 times dayoff of an month, that’s why I wanna meet someone here.

I’m sense of humor, also very kind and full of warmth. BTW the first picture has a baby sitting on my shoulder, that is my nephew not my son, anyway he is adorable, isn’t it?

You have to do something while there's still a chance, because that chance doesn't last forever. Trust me, it's gone before you know it.
forum.title: It’s all about me, if you want to know. Let’s check it out!
